title: Can not access Thunderbird
content: Telstra are changing me to fibre to my home (currently copper to home). In the process they have removed Thunderbird and introduced Telstra web mail which I do not want. But, I do not know have to re-install Thunderbird on my desktop. I need some help as my knowledge is more in keeping with 1940's to 1970's technology. Hope you can help Bob
creator: Valcdavis

title: Thunderbird - stopped downloading emails
content: A few days ago, after several years happy use of Thunderbird, it has stopped downloading my emails to my computer where I have stored them for several years - off line I have no idea how to address the issue as nothing has changed at my end. I am thinking the only solution may be to backup all the data uninstall and reinstall thunderbird - if so what is the safest way to do that please?
creator: jimshek
